comments.author: Mystic.5934
comments.body:
I hope this is a new bug with these runes:
https://api.guildwars2.com/v2/items?ids=63366
[{"name":"",“description”:“Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.”,“type”:“UpgradeComponent”,level,“rarity”:“Exotic”,vendor_value,“game_types”:[“Activity”,“Wvw”,“Dungeon”,“Pve”],“flags”:“AccountBound”,“AccountBindOnUse”],“restrictions”:[],id,“chat_link”:“[&AgGG9wAA]”,“icon”:“https://render.guildwars2.com/file/93A53AB1F304354ED1981AB465BCDD51B2F4D857/220701.png”,“details”:{"type":“Rune”,“flags”:[“HeavyArmor”,“LightArmor”,“MediumArmor”],“infusion_upgrade_flags”:[],“bonuses”:[],“infix_upgrade”:{"attributes":[]},“suffix”:""}}]

edit: gerrrr. I assume this is what it’s referring to: “The unnamed rune created with the Machined Weapon Core recipe can no longer be crafted and is no longer tradable.” ?
to which I have to say: &!#$%)#@kitten*#&!$~
not the worst blow I’ve received from an update, but it is frustrating (I have 7 I was selling).

comments.author: Hvaran.6327
comments.body:
Lawton Campbell.8517:
Hvaran.6327:
Lawton Campbell.8517:

Ah, thanks for the reminder — someone pointed that rune out to me on the trading post and I completely forgot to raise the issue with people who handle content issues. It’ll probably be fixed at some point; I don’t have much insight into content changes.

https://forum-en.guildwars2.com/forum/support/bugs/HOT-End-Story-Recipe-Disapearing/first#post5685028

i don't know but i thought at first that it's impossible to get machined weapons because it was blocking the progress but or it's another way or i dunno.

I think the machined weapons are acquired via item collections — you don’t craft them AFAIK.

i know now, after going through reddit etc, but the recipe was clear that you need it, in the end you don’t. just useless recipe for ending hot story even if fixed seems so.

comments.author: Mystic.5934
comments.body:
https://api.guildwars2.com/v2/items?ids=63366

[{"name":"",“description”:“Double-click to apply to a piece of armor.”,“type”:“UpgradeComponent”,level,“rarity”:“Exotic”,vendor_value,“game_types”:[“Activity”,“Wvw”,“Dungeon”,“Pve”],“flags”:[],“restrictions”:[],id,“chat_link”:“[&AgGG9wAA]”,“icon”:“https://render.guildwars2.com/file/93A53AB1F304354ED1981AB465BCDD51B2F4D857/220701.png”,“details”:{"type":“Rune”,“flags”:[“HeavyArmor”,“LightArmor”,“MediumArmor”],“infusion_upgrade_flags”:[],“bonuses”:["","","","","",""],“infix_upgrade”:{"attributes":[]},“suffix”:""}}]

it’s a superior rune, made from crystalline dust, lump of primordium, and a molten core.
OH! in-game, it also has no name. the stats it adds are all blank :P

hmmm, this might also be a bug: the recipe that makes it (https://api.guildwars2.com/v2/recipes?ids=9295) says it’s learned from an item (recipe sheet), but I seem to be able to make it, and I am pretty sure I never learned it.
